parameters.name: Contry
parameters.description: 2-значный iso-code страны в рамках которой создается процедура

parameters.name: testMode
parameters.description: параметр, сигнализирующий о создании тестовых сущностей

scheme.description: The scheme or codelist from which the classification code is taken.

description.description: A textual description or title for the classification code.

id.description: The classification code taken from the scheme.

documentType.description: A classification of the document described

datePublished.description: The date on which the document was first published.

url.description: A direct link to the document or attachment.
